metadata.name: Number one
metadata.description:
Almost nothing is a personal study about minimalism photography .  
I went in search of the contrast of the deep and dynamism of very well studied compositions with the calm feeling of the huge negative space of the long exposure seascapes  
The perfect harmony is the feeling of serenity and movement at the same time

Title: Number one

Artist: Xose Casal

Collection: Almost Nothing

Edition: 1/1

Date created: October 2021

Location: Spain

Size:7723x5151 px, 300 dpi

Genre: Fine Art Landscape

License: Extended Editorial.

Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
